{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3490184,"name":"Spires Robotics","username":"nathan_bui","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nathan_bui/{size}/236126_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-22T21:48:19.426Z","cooked":"

Hello! I haven’t updated here in a while (mainly due to Christmas break and missing from meeting up with the team, therefore unable to really give an update), but we’re back!!

Not a lot has happened though, besides making new prototypes and coders coding.

IMG_17804032×3024 2.85 MB

IMG_17814032×3024 2.85 MB

IMG_17844032×3024 3.01 MB

IMG_17854032×3024 2.86 MB

This is just us prototyping in our CAD group, it’s around the start of our prototyping and we’re working on a design to pick up the coral. The coral is this cylinder white tube, and it’s fun to stick your hands/arms in it!

IMG_18714032×3024 2.53 MB

IMG_18734032×3024 2.73 MB

IMG_18794032×3024 2.63 MB

These are just when the coders were coding, and some of the CAD people working on the prototypes. The girls were also taught how to crimp wires, it was pretty fun!

I’m not sure if we have any questions, though everything seems to be smoothly sailing right now. And also, this post is pretty delayed. I should’ve made it last saturday (the 18th) but I got distracted with other things and forgot, so I’ve posted this on Wednesday, hopefully that isn’t much of a bad thing!
